name: WNRS x Valentino
preview: When we show up as our authentic selves we empower others to do the same, but sometimes we need a little help opening up.
This expansion pack is an invitation to deeply connect with others and with yourself. To play, both players ask each other questions; you may even reveal parts of yourself that you never met before.
questions:
What have you witnessed
 recently that has given
 you hope for humanity
 in any big or small way?

What limiting belief is holding
 you back the most right now?

What have you overcome this
 year that you weren't sure
 you could?

When was the last time
 you felt truly understood
 by somebody? Who was it?
 What did they understand?

What has this year taught
 you about yourself?
 Good and bad.

Asking for help is a strength
 not a weakness. What do
 you need help with?

What has your negative
 self-talk sounded like
 recently? Replace it
 with an affirmation.

Who in your life can you
 have more empathy towards?
 What's getting in the
 way of that?

What are you judging
 yourself too harshly
 for? How can you show
 more empathy towards
 yourself?

What was the last lie
 you told yourself?

What are you working
 through that others
 don't see?

Is there someone in your
 life you feel misunderstood
 by? What do you wish they
 would understand?

What are you overthinking
 right now? Or who?

How have you neglected
 yourself recently? What's
 one thing you can do to make
 it up to yourself this week,
 big or small?

What "failure" taught
 you the most this year?
 What did it teach you?
What are you holding onto that are hurting you the most? What's one small step you can take towards letting it go?
Who deserves more of your time? How can you show up for them?

What are you still
 trying to understand
 about yourself?
What is the hardest thing for you to understand about yourself?
What do you give in too much energy to? What is that at the expense of?

Wild Card What would you tell
 yourself one year ago
 today? Write it out.

Wild Card Write down one thing you
 want to forgive yourself for.
 Find the lesson and let it go.
Wild Card Who in your life deserves the biggest thank you? Let them know now.

Wild Card Both players write down a
 compliment to one another.
 Fold and exchange. Open
 only when you two
 have parted.

Reminder Have more empathy
 (For yourself too)
